Articles.Content:
There's been a quite big earthquake this morning around Mexico.

So are you all all right ?

Question intended to Squad an all that are in the neighbourhood.

I was going to post something like this.

Also there was another earthquake post a while ago.

The Kraken, it's trying to get into the real world!

But seriously, I hope Squad is alright.
After looking around on USGS' site, it looks pretty localized. Squad probably felt a little shake and nothing more...hopefully.
I'm not based out of Mexico, but I've heard from the team down there. All good in the hood, it seems. Thanks for asking.

I was going to post something like this.

Also there was another earthquake post a while ago.

"a while ago"

Last post was almost exactly 2 years ago xD
